extends FrameLayout

    • 方法详细资料

      • setText

        public void setText(java.lang.String text)
        Changes the button text
        参数:
        text - - String value for what is displayed on the button

      • setLeftIcon

        public void setLeftIcon(java.lang.String leftIcon)
        Changes the left icon on a BootstrapButton
        参数:
        leftIcon- - String value for the icon as per http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/cheatsheet/

      • setRightIcon

        public void setRightIcon(java.lang.String rightIcon)
        Changes the right icon on a BootstrapButton
        参数:
        rightIcon - - String value for the icon as per http://fortawesome.github.io/Font-Awesome/cheatsheet/

      • setBootstrapType

        public void setBootstrapType(java.lang.String bootstrapType)
        Changes the type of BootstrapButton
        参数:
        bootstrapType - - String value for the type of button e.g. "primary"

      • setBootstrapButtonEnabled

        public void setBootstrapButtonEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Specifies whether the BootstrapButton is enabled or disabled
        参数:
        enabled - - boolean state for either enabled or disabled

      • setTextGravity

        public void setTextGravity(java.lang.String gravity)
        Changes the gravity for the text on a bootstrap button that is not wrap_content
        参数:
        gravity - - string for either center, right, or left.
